entry.title: Tahoe Tack Angled Engraved Knee Relief Western Show Stirrups
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 34.95

Tahoe Tack’s engraved angled wetern stirrups were designed to enhance the overall appearance of a western rider in the show and gymkhana ring, while providing knee and hip pain relief that riders often experience. Although these stirrups are beautifully hand engraved, they are not bulky or overly flashy in a way that will distract from the riders performance. These stirrups are versatile and can be used in a variety of western events including western pleasure, horsemanship, trail, gymkhana barrel racing, and everyday riding on the trails. They simply add the right amount of elegance and comfort to your existing tack set. These stirrups only feature the engraved design on one side of each stirrup and are sold in pairs. The color/shade of the leather pieces on these stirrups may very slightly from lot to lot.  

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND - these feature an offset design that aids in preventing knee and hip pain while riding that allows you to ride for longer periods of time and remain more comfortable than traditional stirrups.

  • HAND ENGRAVED DESIGN - these stirrups feature beautiful hand engraving that give the extra detail needed to set you apart in the show arena. Due to the fact that each stirrup is individually hand engraved, the engravings may vary slightly between each stirrup, but overall have the same engraving pattern.
  • IN THE SHOW RING - These stirrups are beautiful in our out of the show ring. Weather you are showing or riding on the trails, these stirrups are eye catching and make any saddle stand out from the rest.
  • STURDY ALUMINUM CONSTRUCTION - Made of strong, hand-engraved, solid aluminum that will never rust. These also feature rubber foot grips to help the riders foot stay in place throughout the entire ride.
  • AVAILABLE IN ADULT SIZE - available in Adult (5”) size to accommodate most riders. Our stirrups are universally sized to fit any western saddle.

entry.title: Aluminum Shock Absorbing Stirrups for Western Barrel Saddles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 37.95

Add a little flair to your western barrel saddle with these aluminum stirrups. Great for Barrel racing, contesting, and other speed events.


  • Light Weight Aluminum
  • Leather tread with shock absorbing pad
  • Comes in pair
  • Size: Adult

Included Components:
  • Neck to tread is 4.5"
  • Tread is 3.5" long and 1 5/8" wide
  • Neck is 3" wide
  • Inside width 4.5"
  • Each pair is 1.9 lbs or .95 lbs for each individual stirrup

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Angled Knee Relief Heavyweight Adult Western Stirrups
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 39.95

Tahoe Tack’s angled stirrups were designed to alleviate knee and hip pain and discomfort that many riders experience while riding. These stirrups give any rider the proper angle to demonstrate a natural and correct equitation posture that will ensure you will stay more comfortable during longer rides. Sold in pairs. 

 

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND - these feature an offset design that aids in preventing knee and hip pain while riding that allows you to ride for longer periods of time and remain more comfortable than traditional stirrups.

  • AVAILABLE IN ADULT SIZE - Available in adult (5-1/4" wide) size to accommodate most riders. Approximately 1.4lbs each
  • HEAVYWEIGHT - you will feel secure in your seat with these heavyweight stirrups weighing 1.5lbs each. 
  • STURDY ALUMINUM CONSTRUCTION - Made of strong, hand-polished, solid aluminum that will never rust. These stirrups are designed to last for many years with proper care.
  • WIDE FOOTBED FOR INCREASED STABILITY -features leather wrapping on the tread for improved grip and a wide footbed to help you better maintain your balance and proper equitation.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patriotic American Flag Angled Knee Relief Western Barrel Stirrups
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 42.95

Tahoe Tack’s angled stirrups were designed to alleviate knee and hip pain and discomfort that many riders experience while riding. These stirrups give any rider the proper angle to demonstrate a natural and correct equitation posture that will ensure you will stay more comfortable during longer rides. The American Flag on the side gives these stirrups a unique look and make these stirrups versatile. 

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND - these feature an offset design that aids in preventing knee and hip pain while riding that allows you to ride for longer periods of time and remain more comfortable than traditional stirrups.

  • AVAILABLE IN TWO SIZES - available in Adult (5.25”) and Youth (4.5”) sizes to accommodate most riders. Our stirrups are universally sized to fit any western saddle.
  • PATRIOTIC AMERICAN FLAG DESIGN - these angled stirrups feature an American flag design on the outside of the stirrups and are great for showing off your country pride at fairs, rodeos, shows, parades, and other western events!
  • STURDY ALUMINUM CONSTRUCTION - Made of strong, hand-polished, solid aluminum that will never rust. Our stirrups are designed to last for many years with proper care.
  • WIDE FOOTBED FOR INCREASED SECURITY -features leather wrapping on the tread for improved grip and a wide footbed to help you better maintain your balance and proper equitation.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Engraved Heavyweight Adult Western Bell Show Stirrups
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 42.95

Tahoe Tack’s engraved heavyweight western stirrups were designed to enhance the overall appearance of a western rider in the show ring. Although these stirrups are beautifully hand engraved, they are not overly flashy in a way that will distract from the riders performance. These stirrups are versatile and can be used in a variety of western events including western pleasure, horsemanship, trail, and everyday riding out on the trails or training arena. They simply add the right amount of elegance and comfort to your existing tack set. The wide bell shape of these stirrups make for an easy mount and dismount and are comfortable during the entirety of your ride. These stirrups only feature the engraved design on one side of each stirrup and are sold in pairs. The color/shade of the leather pieces on these stirrups may very slightly from lot to lot.  

  • IN THE SHOW RING - These stirrups are beautiful in our out of the show ring. Weather you are showing or riding on the trails, these stirrups are eye catching and make any saddle stand out from the rest.

  • HAND ENGRAVED DESIGN - these stirrups feature beautiful hand engraving that give the extra detail needed to set you apart in the show arena. Due to the fact that each stirrup is individually hand engraved, the engravings may vary slightly between each stirrup, but overall have the same engraving pattern.
  • WIDE FOOTBED FOR INCREASED STABILITY -features leather wrapping on the tread for improved grip and a wide footbed to help you better maintain your balance and proper equitation.
  • STURDY ALUMINUM CONSTRUCTION - Made of strong heavyweight hand-engraved solid aluminum that will never rust. Each pair is approximately 1.9 lbs or .95 lbs for each individual stirrup. These have been tested and have shown to hold up to wear and tear of everyday riding with ease for many years.
  • AVAILABLE IN ADULT SIZE - available in Adult (5.25”) size to accommodate most riders. Our stirrups are universally sized to fit any western saddle.

  • VERSATILE - these feature a versatile design that makes these stirrups great for multiple western events like western pleasure, horsemanship, trail, gymkhana barrel racing, or everyday and trail riding.

  • AVAILABLE IN ADULT SIZE - available in Adult (5”) size to accommodate most riders. Our stirrups are universally sized to fit any western saddle.

  • HAND ENGRAVED DESIGN - these stirrups feature beautiful hand engraving that give the extra detail needed to set you apart in the show arena. Due to the fact that each stirrup is individually hand engraved, the engravings may vary slightly between each stirrup, but overall have the same engraving pattern.
